poem:
Title: "Absolution in the Urban Gleam"

Manchester shakes her gory locks;
A politician's home, unorthodox.
Claims of capital gain, now quashed,
In paperwork and legalese, washed.
Tales of wealth and fortuity,
In her humble stature's mutiny.
Yet the soul of every story
Resides in the eye of purgatory.
Unseen hands that serve the nation,
Labourer in silent celebration.
